channel.title: Website Idea's?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
My dad asked me to make him a website, because he recently got into photographical stuff. I was like 'sure', but now I need help on the design. I am completely out of idea's. He just wants it to be clean, but yet professional and attracting.
If you got any idea's or such, please post. I need to get this done quickly. Also, if you could, please show an example or something, just with Paint or w/e.
Example of a website he quite liked: http://www.circlepics.nl/
Thanks alot if you bring me some idea's!

item.title: Website Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:3, topic:478888”]I’d cut out using GFX work more or less completely, besides some form of banner of course. Use entirely CSS for styling, radius, borders etc, you can achieve a pretty nice layout by just fooling around with that, and it keeps it simple. Some form of news script in the center with a three column layout below wouldn’t be a bad thing to take a look at. With professional there’s not a lot of flashy sites involved, keep a two or maybe three tone colour scheme and limit the “funkiness” involved in the banner.

Or yes, use WordPress lol.[/quote]
Yeah, I didn’t plan on using any GFX work, since I’m not good at it and I want it to be handmade :P. I am using CSS for all the stying. I accept my dads request simply because I could probaly learn from it. A 3 column layout should’ve work well, I’ll play around with it!

Thanks for the suggestions.

P.S. WordPress is not an option, want to do it myself, from scratch :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’d cut out using GFX work more or less completely, besides some form of banner of course. Use entirely CSS for styling, radius, borders etc, you can achieve a pretty nice layout by just fooling around with that, and it keeps it simple. Some form of news script in the center with a three column layout below wouldn’t be a bad thing to take a look at. With professional there’s not a lot of flashy sites involved, keep a two or maybe three tone colour scheme and limit the “funkiness” involved in the banner.

Or yes, use WordPress lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

Just use WordPress http://polarized3.photocrati.com/
